hari ehenam mage post ekata aaye, pahu giya apriyel awasanaya,mayi, juni mula wenakan mama unne lankawe diga niwaduwak, karagena hiti job eka ape nada mamakenekta dila lankawata wela unne aaye awith job ekak hoyanawa kiyala hithagena, aaye awith juni idan job hoyanna gaththa,,issara job walin nawathinawa aluth eewata yanawa ee puruddata job hoyanna gaththata agosthu wenakan sthira job ekak ahalakawath na podi podi pat tayim kaliwalin podi ganak hoya gaththata,sthira job ekaka uwamanawa thadinma danuna,ee mage radi sitime balapathrayata rakiya kontharaththuwak uwamana karapu nisa, ee weddi rakiya kontharaththuwak nathuwa kalayak,,mokada ithaliye idan wena ratakata paninna hadapu wadeth habak wela unne, ohoma iddi athe thiyana salli tikath iwara wegena enawa,,kohomath lankawata gihin aaye meheta enne athe sathe nathuwa ne,,pat tayim kali tiken poddak oluwa ussan unna,,eekath samar iwara wegena enakota ekin eka adu una.

shri lanka kandayame sitina jeshtathama kridakayin dedenaku wana anjalo mathiws saha suranga lakmal sharirika yogyatha parikshanayen samathwima nisa batahira indiya kodew sancharaya sandaha owun dedena sahabhagi karawana bawa shri lanka krikat aayathanaya ada (17 wanida) niwedanaya kaleya.
- aware unath piyambaa awith hitha maththe himihita wahuwama unu unuwe watena kandulaka thetha me hatima ghanakam bawa suduredi horo umbaa dannema nathida !

oonama durakathanayakin ‘1919’ amathimen obata sewawa laba gatha hakiya.rajya anshaye prathinirmanaya karapu katayuthuth, janathawata jana jiwithayata sambandha sewa 120 k pamana kshanikawa karaganimata janathawata awasthawa salasa dimath nisa ada lokayama agaya kara atha.
hi 1999 di kerunu paryeshanawalin labunu awasana nigamanaya:
prathipalaya hondatama hodayi...
kotinma ape pawule hamomath eekamathikawa nigamanaya kale ehema.

dewana ha ithama wadagath karanaya wanne gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha adala kara ganimin ella wi athi chodana ha eewata adala wimarshana katayuthu pilibandawa salaka balimedi anekuth chodana saha ngi.ee. rajapaksha padanamata rajaye mudal waya kirima pilibandawa wana chodanawa athara barapathalakama pilibandawa kotharam paratharayak athda yanna karanayayi.
mama hithanne naha marana danduwama thibbath chawesta wiruddhawa eeka yodawanna eda aanduwa kriya karayi kiyala.
aathal sin tikak dammaki habayi.. ^_^ me lagadi hawas waruwaka api ofis ekata giye adu wechcha tiyut wagayak potokopi karagannaya.

idunil kalayak kollek passe giya kollek kiyuwata eka kollekma nemeyi.'kollo' kiyala kiyannath puluwan.ee kale kollo eya passe aawe na.ee ara ath bag ekath kare dagena bas eka passe diwwa dawas wala.passe kale kollo eya passe enna patan gaththa.thora ganime hakiyawa thibune eyata.eekata hethuwa wune bar ekaka biyak ekakata gewime hakiyawa ee wenakota eya sathuwima.

mema siddhiye dewana sakakaru wana karnal siriwardhanage niwasa pariksha kirimedi pragith palamuwarata paharaganimata adalawa girithale buddhi kandawura wisin sadanu labu warthawak hamuwi athi athara ema warthawa kolambaata ragenawith adala sambandha kirim sidukara aththe me hamuda niladhariya wisin bawa handunagena athi bawa pawase.
enam alankaraya, rasikathwaya, sandarbhaya aadiya kerehi pawathina balapam nisaweni.
hasmath siyage asanipe gana dana gaththama asime aachchita therenawa siya eyata wiwaha yojanawak genawe ayi kiyala.
-- bataya anith paththata kate ruwa gath ayage mukha wana wima aniwaryaya..
saka sanka, wichikichcha namathi thamange ma doshaya hethu karagena ma yi ee pinwath shramana brahmanayin noyekuth bhaya birantha papi dewal kandawaganne.
e nisa anithya, dukkha,anathma yana thrilakshanaya wataha ganimata udaw wanne widarshana bhawanawayi.
hama dema iwara wune loku sathutakuth ekka.......
"amme menna ape dosthara mahaththaya " ma desa sinawemin ee tharuna mawa ayage maniyanta ma handunwa dunnaya.

aanduwa kawudayi rajya sewakayo arbudayaka : kumara welgama – anidda puwathpatha aanduwa kawudayi rajya sewakayo arbudayaka : kumara welgama me wanawita rate agamathiwarun dedeneku sitina bawath, nithyanukula aanduwa kumakdayi apahadili wima nisa rajya sewakayanta rajakari kirimata badha athiwi thibena bawath nisi aanduwak nathiwa rajya sewakayan arbudayaka sitina bawath eekabaddha wipaksha parlimenthu mantha්ri kumara welgama anidda samaga pawasiya.

pilika rogaya athi ho nathi bawata winishchaya kalahakke, waidyawarayekuge sayanika parikshawakin, saha saila ho pataka parikshawa, mamogram parikshawa, endoskopi parikshawa wani wishesha parikshana sidukirimen anathuruwa pamani.
nik jons me wana wita pasuwanne 24wani wiyehi ya.
pelapali udghoshana kala.

ese wuwa da, therim karaka sabhawe nigamana adhikaranaya magin awalangu karanu labuwahoth, ema thinduwa siyallan kerehi balathmaka wenawa pamanak nowa, adala karuna sambandhayen eya aagnyathmaka thinduwak da wanneya.

samahara eewanam ara issara kalaye rabar wathu wala kiri kapima saru kalaye hadanna gath gewal wage.
ithin no poto.
kanthawan hamawitama prathiwiruddha lingikayakuge unusumata aasa karayi.
the yanawa, rabar tayar watila thiyenawa.
elmo pranandu mahathage illima paridi ema katayuthu sidu karanu labuwa.
komisan sabhawe sitina nithipathi departhamenthuwe nithignyawaraya pilibadawa mama danne naha.
man hamadema noliya ithama ketiyen liwe.
api mita wada me gana hithanna thibune man hithanne.
godak prashnath hithata aawa.
kilinochchiye gedarath hitiya.
ginna payata sathapum 50 ka wegayen sawana haraha hama yanawa ...
eheth kisidu dimanawak apeksha nokarana ewani katayuthu swechchawen itukarana nithignyayan da me athara siti.
naththan dayasporawa gana mokak hari thamanuth nodanna apabransayak kiyayi.
oya as am as gahanna kiwweth, me nisa wenna athiya.
aththatama ooka witharak newi dan kale lamayinta ahimiwela thiyena de ananthayi.

ee wana witath palamu prayathnaya asarthaka wi thibuneya.
ee nayin bas gamunuta shri lankawe wishwawidyala aacharyawarunge wruththiya samithi sammelanayata wuwada anushasana kala hakiya.
eyin midennata dangalayi.
janadhipathi emarsan manangagwage pradhana prathiwadiya wu nelsan chamisa samanga mathiwarana sandhanayak goda nagima sadaha hitapu mudal amathi tendayi bit katayuthu kara thibuni.
nandikadal jayagrahanaya gana liwimata mata athi ayithiya kumak dayi atham janamadhyawedin prashna karana bawa mama danimi.
babados trayidants kandayama pasugiya wasare shurathawa dinagath kandayamayi.
aarakshakayageyi mageyi dennagema as uda giya.
sarath ralahami tharamak nosansunwa penena manayata awuth balum helayi.
wagayuththarakaruwan wuye mathiwarana komisame niladarin pradeshiya saba gananawaka niladarin amathya fayis musthapa saha nithipathiwaraya athulu thawath niladarinya.
pasuwa yapanaya polis buddhi ansha wisin adala pudgalaya polisita ragenawith wadidura prashna kirim sidu karana bawatada yapanaya polisiya wadiduratath kiya sitiya.
ma gawath ekak thiyanawa.
sama wasarakama meya siduwanne me aakarayata ma wuwath me warshayedi jyeshtayan kalin wasara wala nothibunu dadi apahasuthawakata pathwa thibe.
aanduwa nidahas welandapola matha yam palanayak da pawathwagena yayi.
akamage rassawa mokakda kiyala !
thanathura - wetarwarun (kantha /pirimi) mahanuwara pradhanawa pihiti apage sancharaka hotal jalayata , nuwara eliya ,dabulla,kurunagala,kolambaa saha galla pradesha walin wetarwarun awashyayi.
me thaththwayata muhuna dimama abhiyogayak.
harima gami gathiyak thiyanawa mallige liwime shailiye.
mechchara hariyak liwuwe wap sahodarayage unanduwa nisayi.
